alert.note: Alert for Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 4:21AM PST until March 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches. North winds of 15 to 25 mph. * WHERE...Waterville, Badger Mountain Road, and Mansfield. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Motorists should prepare for winter driving conditions for the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for areas of blowing and drifting snow this morning across the Waterville Plateau. U.S. Highway 2 between Coulee City and the intersection with U.S. 97. State Routes 17 and 174 may also experience visibility reductions due to blowing snow and travel difficulties due to drifting.
info.instruction: Be prepared for severe winter driving conditions on the Waterville Plateau this morning. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
